item.description:
Potlucks rule! So start thinking of what vegan delight you'd like to share with the group. As always, please contact me if you have any questions or suggestions.

Parking: Parking is ok on all side streets, but is NOT ok on Avalon Place (gravel road). It's a private road and all spaces are assigned. Christina's doorbell is on the left side next to her name.



Stephen
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp March Meetup
